function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Legionella bacteria due to legislative constraints on water storage","Impact":"Increased risk of Legionnaires' disease and other waterborne illnesses","Mitigation":"Regular water quality testing, monitoring, and maintenance of water systems","Technologies":"Water treatment and filtration systems, remote water quality monitoring systems","People":"Staff, patients, visitors in hospitals and healthcare buildings","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Low level of building automation and control in Case A","Impact":"Higher vulnerability to operational inefficiency and potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade building automation and control systems, implement remote monitoring and control","Technologies":"Smart building automation systems, IoT sensors, remote monitoring and control software","People":"Building occupants, staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of assessment for water usage and its impact on health in building evaluation tool","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of water-related health risks in building design and operations","Mitigation":"Include water usage assessment and impact on health in building evaluation criteria, promote water-efficient technologies and practices","Technologies":"Water usage monitoring systems, water-efficient fixtures and appliances","People":"Building designers, architects, healthcare administrators, facility management","Owner":"Building owners, tool developers"}]}
